= Android Application =

After installing the extension in your desktop browser you have to install the Apk in your Android phone.

*Note that this application requires Android 2.2 ("Froyo") or later. *

[market://search?q=pname:com.google.android.apps.chrometophone Install the apk] to your phone from the market and then follow the [http://code.google.com/p/chrometophone/wiki/SetupInstructions setup instructions].
